name: Jumpy Balloon
description: Jumpy Balloon is easy to play for any kids. Most of the kids like this type of Balloon Jump Game. You just need to collect the coins and jumping balloon to keep safe water that filled inside the balloon. Tap inside as require passing the obstacle that also shown upper side in a circle. Jumpy Balloon is very challenging game because it needs focus and quick action power. When you tap anywhere on screen the balloon jump inside the rotate circle and able to collect possible coins to make the high score. Inside the circle of playing balloon jumps, there is a hidden obstacle. If the balloon touch that obstacle it will pop immediately but if you want extra life or resume playing there are some “Spawn” feature provided just watch them and continue playing for extra scoring. The circle for playing this balloon jump game is rotating continue in both direction forward and backward so kids or other players need to focus on it and it will also increase focus power. If you once start playing this challenging game it will be your favorite in just seconds.  Graphics and animation of this tapping game are simple and attractive. Your boredom will be gone by playing this exciting and awesome arcade game. Share your high score with others & challenge them to beat your high score. This Game of Balloon also gives you the score sharing feature with friends and different social media platforms. Wish for some difficulty? We’ve got your cover. Some obstacles emerge while playing this balloon touch game. Don’t jump too high balloon will pop because of an upper obstacle. Don’t forget to keep track of time, you’ll get is addicted to this game. Stop waiting and start playing.
